name: vacationed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
vacation
to travel to a place in order to relax, when you are not at work or school: Remember that time we were vacationing in Vermont? Earlier this summer, the family vacationed in Austria. The town is popular with vacationing Americans.
More examplesFewer examplesThey planned to vacation in Hawaii.She has canceled an upcoming trip to a California spa because it doesn't seem right to vacation now. a vacationing couple
